title: Area Volume linear and exponential functions part - b

content.description: Let R be the region enclosed by the graphs of y=ex ,y=x and the lines x=0 and x=4 .
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
